name: Combat-commander
body:
### Combat Commander RST

This is a tool to assist players of GMT [Combat Commander](http://www.gmtgames.com/c-8-combat-commander.aspx)

You will never need to find the paper sheet - support tables: Enter nationality, year and dice rolled, and find which units are elegible as reinforcements.

![screenshoy](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/2827944/capturas/github/framed_cc_screenshot.png)

***


This app has been made with learning purposes, don't expect it to be a profesional tool. And double check the results if you are serious about gaming :D


Development evironments used: AIDE in my SGS3 and Eclipse Kepler in my laptop. [Here](https://github.com/pezbailarin/Combat-Commander) is the repo with the code. 

Inside the zip if you just need the apk. It's inside the bin/ folder. Note you will need to configure your device to allow installation from unknown sources.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
